channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Cloud Transformation Advisor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Cloud Transformation Advisor

item.title: CVE-2022-41299|2024-08-03T12:42:46.054Z -- ibm -- cloud%20transformation%20advisor
item.description: IBM Cloud Transformation Advisor 2.0.1 through 3.3.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 237214.
